db:abstract.db:para: A cookie browser based on Qt WebEngine Widgets.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += core gui webenginewidgets TARGET = cookiebrowser TEMPLATE = app CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += \ main.cpp\ mainwindow.cpp
HEADERS += \ mainwindow.h
FORMS += \ mainwindow.ui \ cookiedialog.ui \ cookiewidget.ui
RESOURCES += \ cookiebrowser.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webenginewidgets/cookiebrowser INSTALLS += target
